title: Ticket #2123: If startd RANK evals to error, confusing message in the log
description: In the course of debugging a problem in the CS pool, we noticed that if the startd RANK can't be evaluated, the startd log just says "Error evaluating RANK". It doesn't say for which slot, or what the rank expression was, or what the consequences are.
check_ins: 2011-May-04 09:49   Check-in [21781]: Clarify log messages when startd RANK canj't be eval'ed #2123 (By Greg Thain )
creator: gthain
